Title: Chinese People's Volunteer Air Force hero Zhang Jihui
Designer: Yun Qicang (恽圻苍)Wang Juping (王居平)
Publisher: Zhongnan junzheng weiyuanhui wenhua bu (中南軍政委員會文化部), Zhongnan renmin chubanshe (中南人民出版社)
Notes: Zhang Jihui (张积慧) became famous for (allegedly) shooting down the American "ace" pilot Major George Andrew Davis, Jr. on 10 February, 1952.
Theme: People's Liberation Army Air Force (PLAAF)Foreign Friends: North Korea
